import Link from 'next/link'; import Head from 'next/head'; import { useIns } from '../pages/contexts/CartContext'; import { useItems } from '../pages/contexts/ProductsContext'; export default function Layout({ children, title = 'This is the default title', }) { const state = useItems(); var itemlen = state.length; const { len, instances } = useIns(); var inslen = instances.length; return (
{title} {/*

); }
